title: Peter Sagan and his Tour de France footprint: ‘The Van Aerts and Pidcocks of today are the Peter of yesterday’
content:
Sagan once helped redefine the Tour de France. But now in his retirement season, the Tour de France left Sagan behind.

Read the full article at Peter Sagan and his Tour de France footprint: ‘The Van Aerts and Pidcocks of today are the Peter of yesterday’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
